subject: Radio Shack Hack links
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
For anyone new to this group, the following may be useful links if 
you are interested in using the Radio Shack Hack 12-469 or 12-470 as 
a Ghost Box item.
- Mike

Similar Ghost Box functions as Frank's Box, Joe's Box, and Mini Box 
for just $24.95?
Pictorial on hacking the 12-469
http://ufogeek.com/?p=81 

Videos of the RS 12-469 and RS 12-470 radio modifications for "Ghost 
Box" type functions
Step-by-step modification instructions
http://ufogeek.com/?p=103

Attempting to modify newer RS 12-470 radio
http://ufogeek.com/?p=107

A video on my practical 12-469 usage in a ghost box type system
http://ufogeek.com/?p=113

Radio Shack Hack
http://ufogeek.com/?p=117

http://ufogeek.com/?p=122

for controlling the devices from outside the chamber and an object 
container
http://ufogeek.com/?p=130
